channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13676] Tests failing because metastore doesn't come up
item.description: In 5-6 test classes, metastore is required to be up for tests to run. The metastore is started in setup Phase asynchronously. But there's no logic to wait till the metastore comes up. Hence, sometimes tests run even when metastore isn't up and fail.
item.summary: Tests failing because metastore doesn't come up

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
